about_the_game:
Two Players, an empty room, a gun, one way out...


A 1v1 fighting game where players engage in intense fights over possession of a gun.

Fast-Paced, High-Stakes Combat: Brace yourself for quick and violent matches. Every second counts, and a single misstep can drastically change the course of a match.

A Fistfight over a Gun: Matches kick off with the drop of a gun and a single piece of ammo. Master the art of disarming your opponent and turn the fight in your favor.

Easy to Learn, Difficult to Master: The game's intuitive design means anyone can pick it up in seconds, but mastering it is a different story. It takes skill, strategy, and quick thinking to consistently come out on top.

Tournament Mode: Compete in Single Elimination or Round Robin brackets, a maximum of 32 players. Whether you're hosting a party or a competitive gaming event, this mode is perfect for testing skills and determining a champion.

Arcade Mode: Comes with additional support for "Credit" and "Free Play" modes, attract screens, and a simplified UI for use in arcade cabinets.

Nothing Good Can Come Of This is a part of the Arcade Commons collective in New York City. It has been featured at the MAGFest Indie Arcade.
Trailer music is Woochia - The Forbidden Door Pt.2, provided by Jamendo.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 18.04, SteamOS 2.0, or equivalent
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-6100, AMD Ryzen 3 1200, or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics: Intel HD 520, AMD Radeon Vega 3, or equivalent
  • Storage: 60 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Two Xbox Gamepads are recommended
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04 / SteamOS 3.0 (or the latest version), or equivalent Linux distribution
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 / AMD Ryzen 5, or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 / AMD Radeon RX 560, or equivalent
  • Storage: 60 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Two Xbox Gamepads are recommended

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS Mojave 10.14 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000 or equivalent
  • Storage: 60 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS Big Sur 11.0 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i5, or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon R9 M370X / Intel Iris Plus Graphics 640, or equivalent
  • Storage: 60 MB available space

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-6100, AMD Ryzen 3 1200, or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics: Intel HD 520, AMD Radeon Vega 3, or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 60 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Two Xbox Gamepads are recommended
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-7400 / AMD Ryzen 5 3400G, or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 / AMD Radeon RX 560, or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 60 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Two Xbox Gamepads are recommended

short_description: Engage in intense battles over the control of a deadly weapon in this local fighting game
supported_languages: English, Italian, Spanish - Spain, French, German, Czech, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Traditional Chinese, Ukrainian, Hebrew, Thai, Turkish, Arabic
